column3: str

<UIForeground>F201FC</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FD</UIGlow> Quest Sync<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>
The Tholl tinkerer is looking for an outsider's help.
Speak with the Tholl tinkerer.

With the chat mode in <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Say<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>, enter any phrase containing “Lali-ho” to distract the Gogg lookouts.
Speak with the Tholl tinkerer.
Speak with the Tholl tinkerer.
Lali-ho! Oh, you couldn't have chosen a better time to visit!
Those vile Goggs have stolen away my precious automaton! Stolen her away, and stashed her in some cluttered corner of their village with the rest of their ill-gotten goods...
Problem is, I'm a drinker, not a fighter. And I doubt I could creep past their guards without one of them seeing me.

That's where I need your help! If <Switch(PlayerParameter(71))><Case(1)>a Hume</Case><Case(2)>an elf</Case><Case(3)>a strange dwarf</Case><Case(4)>a Mystel</Case><Case(5)>a Galdjent</Case><Case(6)>a Drahn</Case><Case(7)>a Ronso</Case><Case(8)>a Viis</Case></Switch> like you were to walk in and distract them, then I could smuggle out my automaton with no one the wiser!
I mean, you shouldn't be in any danger. Goggs and Tholls are mortal enemies, aye, but they don't attack other folk on sight. Usually.
Let's move a little closer to Komra, and get this rescue mission underway! Don't you worry, my little bucket of bolts─you'll soon be home again!
Do you see those two lookouts? Just walk up to them, bold as you please, and give a hearty “lali-ho!”

Once you have their attention, tell them...oh, I don't know...that you saw a stinky Tholl sneaking about nearby or something. That should get them moving. Then I'll tiptoe in, grab my automaton, and meet you back here.

Just belt out a happy “lali-ho,” then tell those lookouts you saw a Tholl nearby. Once they move off to investigate, I'll slip in and out, then meet you back here with my automaton. Sound like a plan?
Lali-ho

With the chat mode in <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Say<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>, use your keyboard or the software keyboard to enter any phrase containing “Lali-ho” to distract the Gogg lookouts.
Hm? You lookin' for trouble, stranger?
Lali-ho! What brings you to Komra?
What!? A stinkin', ugly Tholl!? I'll catch the bugger by his piss-drenched beard, and knock his helm clear into next week!
Lali-ho! What can the Gogg do for you?
A Tholl!? Here!? Aye, you did well to let me know. I'll soon take care of this lurker...
Well done, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>lass<Else/>lad</If>! You played your part to perfection! As you can see, the rescue was a success!
Come on back to Tomra, and we can talk rewards.
Ever since there've been dwarves, it seems the Goggs have hated the Tholls. Although I'm not rightly sure why...
Well, I know why we hate the Goggs! Their beards are unkempt, straggly messes, and the bastards dig in our mines without so much as a by-your-leave!
Grrr, it makes my blood boil! Next time they come around, I'll be waiting with an automaton army! We'll make them wish they never left Komra, the thieving, scrounging curs!
Oh, I almost forgot your reward. And I'll be keeping a closer eye on my dear clunker here, don't you worry...
